name: test_charm_upgrade
description:
arrange: given latest stable version of the charm.
    act: charm upgrade is called.
    assert: the charm is upgraded successfully.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: given latest stable version of the charm.
act: charm upgrade is called.
assert: the charm is upgraded successfully.
